
PayPal Payments Standard - Version 1.0.1
========================================


Version 1.0.1 - Release 07/02/2012

  - Fixed curl call to force SSL certificate validation

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0.0 - Release 11/01/2007

  - Initial release for EncryptedWebPayments(EWP) PHP library with PDT and IPN samples.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
